name: cypress-github-custom-actions
description: Running sypress tests with custom github actions

scripts.test:report: npm run test && npx mochawesome-merge cypress/reports/.jsons/*.json > cypress/reports/index.json
scripts.report:generate-html: npx marge --reportDir public --assetsDir public/assets --reportPageTitle index.html cypress/reports/index.json

author: Harmeet Singh
